programme.title: Hair Force One
programme.short_synopsis: How is Bill Clinton's approval rating affected by news of his $200 haircut?
programme.medium_synopsis: Clinton's falling approval rating, accusations of cronyism, the importance of the trivial in presidential politics and what happens when a boy from Arkansas gets a $200 haircut.
